coreAttributes.name: arcane rope shorts
coreAttributes.description: A bundle of rope specially enchanted to become decorative rope shorts, or rebundle itself.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope around [npc.her] hips, watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the rope around [npc2.namePos] hips, watching as it neatly bundles itself up.
